tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I believe, Parent hood is the biggest fortune that can happen in one's life.
With so much of unpleasant surprises in mine & my wife's life, the only way forward we felt was to become parents & move on like any normal family. We had our doubts when we decided to go to a fertility clinic like any of you have. Whether this is right decision, right place, where these clinics are business/money oriented. But it took a positive twist since we met Dr.Arunima. 
Not only that Arunima mam's treatment, diagnosis, prescriptions, suggestions where accurate & more than perfect, the warmth of a caring sister was there since day 1 and till date. Glad to say that, now we are expecting and all thanks goes to Arunima Mam. Like any of us face, there will be many panic situations & doubts during this phase & mam stood strong with us to resolve it even during odd hours(Remember, she is the mother of a new born baby). She is a doctor that we can trust 100% and she never suggests any medicine that is not necessary. During lock down situations, where mobility & transportation was risky, she even extended support beyond the expectation to make it so smooth. Even after conceiving & proceeding with the maternity phase, mam makes a point that she calls/pings and ensure that we are on a non-risk path which hardly I have seen in any doctors in my life.

You can trust my words as not a marketing content but true facts to the fullest. Mam is family to us.
reply_text: Thank you Ajay for these beautiful words. Humbled.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Arunima is a gem. She took utmost care with my IUI treatments, she was always available to answer any of our doubts. Most supportive Dr ever. She continued her support even though my IUI journey wasn’t fruitful and guided me into the next steps with my fertility journey. Never suggests unwanted tests and procedures. Very understanding and compassionate. Highly satisfied.
reply_text: Thank you maria for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We were consulting Dr.Arunima at Milann and we are happy with positive results. She is very caring  and patiently listens to all our doubts. Never forced us with her decision instead explains clearly and gives possible options letting us to choose. 
Thank you so much for all the care and support you have given us till now.
reply_text: Thank you roshni. All the best for future. Stay happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Arunima is a brilliant doctor , * **** *** ** *** **** ** ********* *** * She has helped through all our journey for us to become parents . Nonetheless she is very friendly and will understand you the way you want to . Apart from being a professional she always helped when we called her with everything. Anyone who is planning to have kids should visit her and only her . Kudos Doctor .
reply_text: Thank you sinchan for these wonderful words. Congratulations and all the very best..

review: I want just share my personal experience with DrArunima ..Its been a year consulting her Shez one of the best dctr i eva knw  ...Always friendly n motivate u to be postv ...Very happie and lucky to be treated under her ...Hope i get good news soon ...I would recommend the ladies with infertility to pls consult her for further assiatance ...M sure she will be of great help to you ...Thank You Ma'am Ua just a amazing doctor ...
reply_text: Thank you dear sneha for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor was very friendly and the explanations was very clear. 
Very understanding person.
Really loved the way of explaining things.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

review: *** **  * **** ****** *** Excellent Human Being, I was treated for  OBG problem.  Now I am well and doing good.  She can communicate and attends our  queries attentively and patiently
